product_meta.title: Champro TRI-FLEX Forearm Pad
product_meta.description: Tri Flex Forearm Sleeves are a Compression forearm sleeve with TRI-FLEX pad system for optimum protection and flexibility. TRI-FLEX pad moves and flexes allowing for full range of motion.
feature_bullets: FOREARM SLEEVE: This compression forearm sleeve with TRI-FLEX pad system is designed to provide optimum protection and flexibility while playing a variety of sports--great for basketball, football, hockey, and more.
TRI-FLEX PAD SYSTEM: The TRI-FLEX pad system is constructed with strategically placed triangular pads to conform to the player's body.
MOISTURE-WICKING: The fabric’s DRI-GEAR technology wicks away moisture, keeping players drier and more comfortable.
COMPRESSION FIT: Spandex/Polyester fabric offers excellent fit and comfort.
SIZE OPTIONS: Available in small, medium, and large sizes - perfect for any age or skill level.
